By Alex Weprin on January 21, 2011 3:32 PM " ABC has scheduled a new primetime " Barbara Walters special focusing on people that have undergone heart surgery. A Barbara Walters Special: A Matter of Life and Death will air Friday, February 4 at 10 PM and will feature interviews with former President Regis Philbin . It also features an interview with late night host David Letterman , who rarely sits down with interviewers. "Nightline" shortened

people give him credit for." Though Dermot O'Leary admits he enjoys working with Simon Cowell , he and the rest of the people who work with the music mogul hate to let him down. He added: Don't get me wrong, he's still my boss, but he's sort of a Victorian father- you'd hate to let him down. On the occasion that happens I literally feel sick. While Dermot O'Leary would love to continue working with Simon Cowell by taking a role on the US' X Factor' he is trying not to worry about it.

was going to take time for everything to come together under the leadership of Allen Iverson . Try two games. Allen Iverson had 28 points and 13 assists in Denver's 116-105 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. I'd say we're real comfortable with him now, said Reggie Evans , who had 14 points and 14 rebounds coming off the bench. Allen Iverson picked up his second double-double-- and first win-- since being acquired by Denver for Andre Miller , Joe Smith and two first-round picks

Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system." Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward. , which also recounts his first tour as Pentagon chief under Gerald Ford , begins with Donald Rumsfeld 's 1983 trip to Baghdad as Ronald Reagan 's envoy. "It seems unnatural," Saddam Hussein told him during a two-hour meeting, to have a whole generation of Iraqis growing up knowing little about America and a whole generation of Americans growing up knowing little about Iraq. Donald Rumsfeld had uttered the same words the night before to the Iraqi dictator's aide, Tariq Aziz, and wondered whether the room had been bugged. Nearly two decades later, in the rubble of 9/11

in with "Idol" alongside Simon Cowell and the adorably kooky Paula Abdul , will share the judges panel with Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler - high-profile newcomers being counted on to return some much-needed buzz to the aging franchise.
